projects.name: Smart Shopping List
projects.description: 'Smart' shopping list application that learns user's buying habits and reminds them of when items will next need to be purchased
projects.techstack: React, React Router, JavaScript, HTML, Tailwind, Firebase

projects.name: Flags of the World
projects.description: Responsive single page application built with React. Integrates the REST Countries API to display country flags and information with searching and filtering options.
projects.techstack: React, React Router, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

projects.name: Tip Split Calculator
projects.description: Responsive calculator application built with React. Calculates tip based on percentage or custom input value. Splits tip and bill total out per person.
